title: Relates to the period of validity of certificates attesting to the satisfactory completion of an approved police basic training program
summary: Relates to the period of validity of certificates attesting to the satisfactory completion of an approved police basic training program awarded by the executive director of the municipal police training council.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to the period of validity of certificates attesting to the satisfactory completion of an approved police basic training program
